attributes.action: Cancel standing charges on energy bills.
attributes.background: Government should as a measure to help reduce rising energy costs, cancel all standing charges on energy bills

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for energy providers.

You can find out more about standing charges here: https://www.energyhelpline.com/help/what-are-unit-rates-and-standing-charges

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a related action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606586
